Dedicated Care

Everyone Deserves Our
Best Services

Personal Care

Providing personal and domestic care,
helping with essential support daily routines,
ensuring dignity and comfort.

Domestic Care

Domestic care, sitting services, and
live-in options designed to create a safe
and supportive home environment.

Companion Care

Accompanying clients to health appointments
or providing friendly companionship
to reduce isolation and improve well-being.

About Care Inclusive

Learn About
Care Inclusive Professional
Senior Care Agency

Our team of trained carers bring expertise in a range of care services, from personal support and companionship. We prioritise a holistic approach, focusing not just on physical health, but also on emotional well- being and quality of life.

  • Compassionate care tailored to your unique needs.
  • Holistic approach prioritizing health, well-being, and quality.
  • Building trust through respect, integrity, and kindness.
Read More
Why Choose Us

Why Choose
Care Inclusive

At Care Inclusive Limited we strive to meet and exceed our clients expectations, we aim to support clients and promote independence to enable them to achieve the highest quality of life possible, with our sensible holistic approach we always put you first and your well-being and trust in us is our main objective.

1

Registered and Regulated by CQC

Our Registered Manager has over 19 years of experience delivering high-quality, person-centred care. She has worked in a variety of health settings as care officer and community occupational therapist.

2

Personalised Home Care

We aim to promote our client’s independence in the comfort of their own homes, ensuring respect, dignity and safety.

3

Well Trained staff

Our staff are trained to provide you with high-quality care in a wide range of areas including safeguarding, medication administration, moving & handling, infection control, health and safety, food hygiene, and other relevant training.

4

Confidentiality

Customer confidentiality is extremely important to us. We are fully compliant with GDPR and data protection.

5

Family Contact

We are open and transparent with family members and share details of each visit when requested.

About

Care Inclusive Limited provides compassionate, tailored care,
focusing on physical and emotional well-being.

With expertise and collaboration,
we empower clients to live fulfilling, independent lives.
